about_the_game:
F11 Football Manager is the simplest and most addictive football management simulation. Take full control of your club, from strategic signings to stadium upgrades, and lead your team to glory.

⚽ Key Features:

Full Club Management: Decide on tactics, make key signings, upgrade facilities, and negotiate contracts.

Full League System: Compete in leagues from Argentina, England, Spain, Italy, Brazil, France, Germany, and more with promotions and relegations.

Business & Finance: Close sponsorship deals, manage broadcast rights, and make investment decisions to strengthen your finances.

Youth Development: Train future stars with your youth coach and discover hidden talents thanks to your scouts.

Customization Options: Upgrade the stadium, design the game strategy, and customize every aspect of the club.

Specialized Staff: Hire physiotherapists, psychologists, assistants, scouts and more, each with a key role in the team's success.

🏆 Take your team to the top

Do you have what it takes to turn your club into a football legend? Show off your managerial skills in F11 Football Manager.

name: F11 Football Manager

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Sistema Operativo: Windows 7 / 8 / 10.
  • Processor: Procesador: Core 2 Duo o superior.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU con al menos 512 MB de RAM de vídeo.

short_description: Manage your own club in F11 Football Manager. Sign players, upgrade the stadium, negotiate sponsorships and devise tactics to lead your team to glory. Do you have what it takes to be the best football manager?
supported_languages: English, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, French, Turkish
